channel.title: Talking to an NPC....?
channel.description: How do I make it where if you talk to an NPC, it'll be at the bottom of the screen, with selections to choose, etc.. And, like, how would I make one of the selections teleport you somewhere? --Do you understand what I am trying to say? I don't know if it came out clear, or not..--

item.title: Talking to an NPC....?
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

How do I make it where if you talk to an NPC, it’ll be at the bottom of the screen, with selections to choose, etc… And, like, how would I make one of the selections teleport you somewhere? --Do you understand what I am trying to say? I don’t know if it came out clear, or not…–
